TopicTitle: Please make some adjustments for 4K+ resolutions

Articles.Content: Some elements of KSP scale up just fine when you're running at mega-resolutions.  Others... don't.  The AP/PE text (and almost all other map screen text for that matter), for example, are utterly microscopic in 4K and it will only get worse at higher resolutions.  Many mods also don't properly scale to 4K+, but that's on mod makers.  The UI scaling options do nothing, and thus I am forced to run the game at 2K if I don't want eyestrain when using map mode.
